data.name: Manuel Salvador
data.profile:
I am a full-stack web developer, I transform ideas into scalable, secure and flexible products.

I am passionate about learning about new frameworks, technologies, tools and best practices, to give the best of me and that my work is of quality

I would love to continue developing in the IT area and gain experience that will serve me both professionally and personally.
